4.3.1.name: Boulder/cobble placements
4.3.1.description: include large, medium and small boulders with D50 of 900 mm, 600 mm and 400 mm respectively.

4.3.2.name: Large boulder placements
4.3.2.description: placed in lines downstream from the instream piers on 5 m centres starting approximately 4 to 5 m downstream of the pier.
